description: This fresh corn salsa has a wonderful balance of sweet, spicy and savory. Fresh, Bright, and healthy it will brighten all your summer dishes.
keywords: corn, salsa, recipe, kosher, vegan, gluten-free, summer fresh
name: Fresh Summer Corn Salsa Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 jalape√±o pepper, seeded and diced small
The juice of one lime (or more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: You can make this corn salsa with raw corn or by slightly cooking the corn on the stove, I you choose to keep the corn raw move to step 3.
Cut the corn kernels off the cob. Heat the olive il oil in a nonstick pan, add the corn and cook over medium heat for 3-5 minutes, stirring constantly, until caramelized
In a large bowl combine the rest of the ingredients. Add the cooked corn and toss gently. Refrigerate until ready to use
